SELECT BNO, B_TNO, B_TYPE, B_TITLE, M.PROFILENAME, REGEXP_REPLACE(B_CONTENT, '<[^>]*>|\&([^;])*;', '') AS B_CONTENT, B_HIDDEN, B.MNO, M.NICNAME, B.CREATE_DATE, B.MODIFY_DATE, B.STATUS, B.NMNO, B.CANO, CASE WHEN C.CANAME IS NULL THEN '미분류' ELSE C.CANAME END AS CANAME , B.CNO, B.B_LEVEL, B.TARGET_BNO, B.IS_OPEN, B.NEED_POINT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE TARGET_BNO = B.BNO) AS COMMENTS, NM.NM_TITLE FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.MNO = M.MNO) LEFT JOIN CATEGORY C ON(B.CANO = C.CANO) JOIN NARUMARU NM ON(B.NMNO = NM.NMNO) WHERE B.B_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchCondition} || '%' AND B.STATUS = 'Y' AND (B_TYPE = 200 OR B_TYPE = 100) ORDER BY BNO DESC
